speakers.name: Mikhail Zotyev
speakers.bio: Dart & Flutter GDE. Author of telegram-channel about Flutter 'Oh, my Flutter'. Flutter Voronezh meetup group organizer. Member of the Mobius Conference Program Committee. Maintainer of the Elementary library for Flutter.

title: Motion Designer is your best friend for creating animations
description: Animation is a powerful tool to convey messages, evoke emotions, and send feedback on a user's action. Every detail of a good animation is well thought out and makes sense. A motion designer cares about it. Our task as developers is not to miss these details and implement exactly what our colleague has created. In this talk, I will share how we at Wolt approach this problem using motion specifications and Flutter.
